name: GULL (Vincent Van Thall, Farry1)
description:
GULL is a side-scrolling shoot-em-up developed by a team of 2 in a time span of 48 hours for the Kenny Jam 2022.

The theme for this game jam was “growth”. In GULL you can collect pick-ups to add parts (more guns) to your spaceship and therefore let your ship grow in overall size. But enemies will shoot back and you must maneuver yourself through the level carefully. You can also pick up health items to restore your damaged space ship to be fully armed to encounter the final boss.

Conntrols

W: Up 
A: Left
S: Down
D: Right
Space/Left Mouse: Shoot

Credits
Programming/GameDesign: Lukas Fabry
Music/SoundFx/GameDesign: Jan-Vincent Mehnert
